content: बोध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Knowing, understanding. --धः [बुध्-भावे घञ्] {@--1@} Perception, knowledge, apprehension, observation, conception; बालामां सुखबोधाय <ls>T. S.</ls> {@--2@} Idea, thought. {@--3@} Understanding, intellect, intelligence, wisdom. {@--4@} Waking up, becoming awake, a waking state, consciouness. {@--5@} Opening, blooming, expanding. {@--6@} Instruction, advice, admonition. {@--7@} Awakening, rousing. {@--8@} An epithet, designation. {@--9@} <ab>N.</ab> of a district.
